core:processNote.core:description: Set the sourceLocationId to null if the stockAdjustmentId is given. Since the stockAdjustmentId can uniquely identify a stock adjustment. Just in case the stock adjustment is not sourced from this location.

core:dataAssignment.fromExpression: indexOf(list, selectedItem) %25==24 || size(list) == (indexOf(list, selectedItem) + 1)? list[indexOf(list, selectedItem)]: list[indexOf(list, selectedItem) + 1]
